plot: Curious penguins investigate an abandoned cabin, heedless of their mother's warning that "curiosity killed the cat."
title: Peeping Penguins
plot_es: Curious penguins investigate an abandoned cabin, heedless of their mother's warning that "curiosity killed the cat."
plot_en: Curious penguins investigate an abandoned cabin, heedless of their mother's warning that "curiosity killed the cat."
